resources.string: This is a sample app intended for developers of Android apps and games intending to use the GyroCheck Library.

GyroCheck is a simple Library that will allow a developer to easily test for proper Gyroscope functions in their app. When placed into the target Java file, the library will display the Gyroscope stats in the bottom right hand corner of the activity, and will change as the phone is rotated. This can be used to check if the Gyroscope is working properly. For suggestions or any issues, visit github.com/MJonesDev/GyroCheck.
